Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 18 Feb 2019Hi,To start building a dividend investing portfolio, you need to know how to identify dividend companies. You can start looking for dividend companies by the consistency of their dividend payment and the type of business. 0 comments0
